item.title: CVE-2021-36833|2024-09-17T03:28:53.980Z -- ibericode -- mc4wp%3A%20mailchimp%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Authenticated (admin or higher user role) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ibericode's MC4WP plugin <= 4.8.6 at WordPress.
